page.title: 03NEW HOUSES-STOKE GIFFORD
page.content: There is a great variety of housing in each road,most of the houses are semi and detached. All the houses have at least one garage. The estate has 340 houses at present but a lot more are being built. Many occupants complain that there are not enough facilities for such a big estate as there is only one post office,two pubs, a solicitors and a garage. It is said that a supermarket will be built. Most people have moved from other parts of Bristol and were previous house owners. Many have moved in search of a bigger,newer house and more pleasant surroundings. Mothers like the area because it is safe for children to play but are worried because small children have a long way to travel to primary school.
